actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize the construction of a memorial to the 100th Infantry Battalion and 442d Regimental Combat Team.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to construct and maintain a memorial in honor of the 100th Infantry Battalion and 442d Regimental Combat Team. Directs that such memorial shall be located at the National Memorial Cemetery of the Pacific. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this resolution.

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize the construction of a memorial to the 100th Infantry Battalion and 442d Regimental Combat Team.
